text: - CoStar Group is the leader
in providing real estate information

to all different customers
in the marketplace.

Whether that's commercial
real estate information
via our CoStar and LoopNet products,

or whether that's residential
real estate information
via our apartments.com,
apartment finder, and homes.com products.

So at CoStar across all
of our different brands,

we ingest around 150,000 images
and videos every single day.
And to keep the images that are uploaded

in line with our terms
and conditions of use,

Rekognition provided us a
turnkey solution off the shelf

pre-trained machine
learning models that could
detect any bad images or videos

and allow us to automatically
take corrective action.
Possible now is massive scanning

of imagery and classification
of imagery for profanities,
for imagery that contains text.

But also recently we've started
to use Rekognition's object

tagging API to actually tag
things that are in the picture.
We can use that to enhance our listings.

By engineering this
solution using Rekognition

it's enabled us to automate
a lot of the verification

of imagery, and AWS is such
a fantastic partner for us

because we've been able
to build next generation
products that are running in the cloud

and are therefore scaling
and high performance, as well

as us being able to
reduce costs because we're

not having to think about
running infrastructure anymore.

The real estate sector is
an ever changing industry.
We're seeing massive growth and use
of our products in the recent years

and this sort of technology
has enabled us to innovate
and deliver quicker on all
of our products that we build at CoStar.
